snippet: GUTFREUND--John H. The trustees and staff of Aperture Foundation express profound sadness at the passing of John H. Gutfreund, beloved Aperture supporter and husband of Susan Gutfreund. John served as a trustee of Aperture for two decades, including as board chair from 2001 to 2005. He was an extraordinary leader and his spirit and commitment to Aperture will be missed. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Susan and John's entire family and the many individuals whose lives he influenced. Cathy M. Kaplan Chair, Celso Gonzalez-Falla Chair, Development Committee and former Chair, Willard Taylor Vice Chair, Frederick M.R. Smith Treasurer, Michael Hoeh Secretary, and Chris Boot Executive Director 1/3
lead_paragraph: GUTFREUND--John H. The trustees and staff of Aperture Foundation express profound sadness at the passing of John H. He was an extraordinary leader and his spirit and commitment to Aperture will be missed. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Susan and John's entire family and the many individuals whose lives he influenced. Cathy M. Kaplan Chair, Celso Gonzalez-Falla Chair, Development Committee and former Chair, Willard Taylor Vice Chair, Frederick M.R.
